includedAssets.title: Independence Day (1996)
includedAssets.synopsis: When aliens attack America it's down to maverick pilot Will Smith and satellite technician Jeff Goldblum to save the day. Smash-hit action.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When aliens attack America it's down to maverick pilot Will Smith and satellite technician Jeff Goldblum to save the day. Smash-hit action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When aliens attack America it's down to maverick pilot Will Smith and satellite technician Jeff Goldblum to save the day. Smash-hit action.

includedAssets.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
includedAssets.synopsis: Twenty years after their first unsuccessful global takeover, the aliens are back to launch the mother of all invasions... and on a ship so vast it creates its own gravity. Blowing Earth's defences away and creating chaos across the planet, it seems nothing can stop them. But as veterans of the first war including super-scientist Levinson (Jeff Goldblum) and ex-president Whitmore (Bill Pullman) join forces with a new generation of heroes, it's clear that humanity is not going down without a fight. Monumental displays of courage, selflessness and visual pyrotechnics ensure that director Roland Emmerich's second Fourth of July parade goes off with an almighty bang.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Liam Hemsworth and Jeff Goldblum are among the brave few who unite to save the world from returning alien invaders. Blockbuster sci-fi sequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Twenty years after their first unsuccessful global takeover, the aliens are back to launch the mother of all invasions... and on a ship so vast it creates its own gravity. Blowing Earth's defences away and creating chaos across the planet, it seems nothing can stop them. But as veterans of the first war including super-scientist Levinson (Jeff Goldblum) and ex-president Whitmore (Bill Pullman) join forces with a new generation of heroes, it's clear that humanity is not going down without a fight. Monumental displays of courage, selflessness and visual pyrotechnics ensure that director Roland Emmerich's second Fourth of July parade goes off with an almighty bang.

includedAssets.title: Independence Day Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: When aliens launch an attack on Earth, only maverick pilot Will Smith and satellite technician Jeff Goldblum can save the day. Years later, the aliens are back and Liam Hemsworth and Jeff Goldblum must lead the last line of defence.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When aliens attack, only Will Smith and Jeff Goldblum can save the day. Later, Liam Hemsworth and Jeff Goldblum defend Earth as the aliens return.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When aliens launch an attack on Earth, only maverick pilot Will Smith and satellite technician Jeff Goldblum can save the day. Years later, the aliens are back and Liam Hemsworth and Jeff Goldblum must lead the last line of defence.

includedIn.title: Independence Day
includedIn.synopsis: When aliens attack, only a maverick pilot and an eccentric technician can save Earth. Years later, the aliens are back, but the humans are ready.
